1.title: Full Fashion Frenzy
1.plot: The Bella Rene team prepares for their Spring Fashion Show. Kendra and Sherlynda try to outdo each other as they vie to be Kenyatta's number two.

2.title: Who's the B in the Skinny Jeans
2.plot: Kenyatta hires skinny, PR Director, Kelli. Kendra and Kelli compete for Kenyatta's approval at the lookbook photoshoot.

3.title: Chubby Chasers
3.plot: Bella Rene's pop up fashion show creates a buzz. Kenyatta and the girls stake out Phil at a nightclub.

4.title: Junk in the Trunk Show
4.plot: Rene puts the hammer down on spending.

5.title: Drama at the Big Show
5.plot: Kenyatta proudly debuts Bella Rene's first-ever, high-fashion fall line. Kendra and Sherlynda compete.

6.title: Fat Chance in New York
6.plot: Bella Rene takes on Manhattan! Kenyatta seeks to wow New York's plus-size fashion world. The conflict between Kendra and Kenyatta comes to a head.

imdb.plot outline: The fashion industry is a hardcore, high-dollar, highly-competitive, skinny, skinny world. But watch out because Kenyatta Jones is coming down the runway! House of Curves follows Atlanta-based, plus-size clothing designer, Kenyatta Jones as she kicks down the doors of fashion with her six-inch stilettos. The series chronicles the passionate and hilarious trials of Kenyatta and her team as they teeter on the precipice of making it big in the fierce world of fashion. Kenyatta is the CEO of Bella Rene and has designed her dream wardrobe for plus-sized women. With her two best friends from college, an assistant with an attitude and her mother as her main investor, Kenyatta and company will do anything to expand their brand. Mishaps, misadventures and in-house bickering may get in the way of the dream, but in the end, her girls always have Kenyatta's back. The team is put to the test when Kenyatta and crew compete for recognition in the fashion capital of the world, New York City.
